rstac 0.1.3
  • Reference

Endpoint functions

stac_collections.Rd

The stac_collections function implements the WFS3 /collections and /collections/{collectionId} endpoints (v0.8.0).

Each endpoint retrieves specific STAC objects:

  • /collections: Returns a list of STAC Collection published in the STAC service

  • /collections/{collectionId}: Returns a single STAC Collection object

stac_collections(url, collection_id)

Arguments

url

A character informing the base url of a STAC web service.
collection_id

A character collection id to be retrieved.

Value

If no collection_id is informed, stac_collections returns a list of STAC Collections. Otherwise, it will return a stac_collection object representing a specific STAC Collection.

See also

get_request, post_request, stac_items

Examples

if (FALSE) {

stac_collections("http://brazildatacube.dpi.inpe.br/bdc-stac/0.8.0") %>%
    get_request()

stac_collections("http://brazildatacube.dpi.inpe.br/bdc-stac/0.8.0",
                 collection_id = "CB_64_16D_STK") %>%
    get_request()
}
